name: You've Got A Friend in Me
name_original: You've Got A Friend in Me
description:
A bad trip sends you on a journey through the urban underbelly....who will you trust?

Maykel - Greyboxing, 3D Modelling, UI

Christian - Story, Artistic Director,  2D Environment Artist

Reyhan - Level Design, Programmer

Murley - Programmer

Shaiyan - 2D Character Artist
